channel.title: Unsure if client-sided or server-sided
channel.description:
Please dont go right off and say client. I tried my client on like 2-3 servers and it works diferently between them. Kalphite queen uses that skull for her prayer, and the wildy skull when attacking someone first is protect from melee. Yet, on my old server, kalphite used correct prayer, but the headicons didnt even work for prayers or skulls.
[IMG]http://i26.tinypic.com/35bfb4w.jpg[/img]
